document.full_text: attackers have killed at least 16 people and set fire to more than a dozen houses in a town in northern nigeria that has been beset by years of sectarian violence, police said late on friday.
document.title: attackers kill 16, burn homes in north nigeria town
lines_and_colors: attackers have killed at least 16 people and set fire to more than a dozen houses in a town in northern nigeria that has been beset by years of sectarian violence, police said late on friday.
